instruction: Boil water and cook pasta according to package instructions.
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper. Cook on a grill or stovetop until fully cooked.
Chop tomatoes and garlic. Saut√© in olive oil until soft. Add spinach and cook until wilted.
Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Mash black beans and mix with cooked quinoa. Form into patties and cook until golden brown.
